After using this consistently along with the No. 5 conditioner, my hair felt softer to the touch and appeared to be shinier (and as a result, healthier). It didn’t magically “heal” my split ends, but it softened the look of them and made my hair look more cohesive, rather than looking like a bunch of distinct, ratty strands. I don’t know if the difference was dramatic enough to justify the high price point of this shampoo, but it’s a very nice luxury to treat your hair to occasionally.
